personal_info.name: Vanshaj Raghuvanshi
personal_info.bio: I am a third-year Computer Science and Engineering Student, aspiring to be a software engineer with a focus on Generative AI, while also pursuing Conversational AI at university. I like making software that makes things easier, and am actively looking for work opportunities.

education.institution: Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology

work_experience.description:
Performed data cleaning and refining for training and testing datasets that improved accuracy by 30%. 

Utilized libraries such as TensorFlow and PyTorch to train models and researched relevant AI tools and techniques.

Created multiple image processing and machine learning projects utilizing libraries such as OpenCV, Keras, and TensorFlow. 

Designed intuitive GUIs for all projects, leading to a 15% increase in user interaction and engagement.
Directed a high-impact workshop for HacktoberFest 2023, propelling the event into the prestigious HacktoberFest Hall of Fame amongst the top 10k contributors.
Currently working as the technical lead of TICC, also a mental health student ambassador.

projects.name: Nexus QA
projects.description: A chatbot that uses LLMs and RAG to answer questions about Vanshaj Raghuvanshi. Hosted on Streamlit.

projects.name: Pneumonia Detection
projects.description: An application that uses a trained Convolutional Neural Network to predict whether uploaded X-Ray images exhibit pneumonia, and compares the results obtained via PCA, SVM and Logistic Regression as well. Hosted on Streamlit.

projects.name: Branchify
projects.description: A published python package that creates the folder structure of whichever directory it is used in, with customizable parameters.

projects.name: AutoQuote
projects.description: A published VS Code Extension that allows for automatic insertion of quotes in the code, with similar additional features.

achievements.title: Scholarship
achievements.description: Secured a scholarship for academic performance at university
